_For global multi-region releases._

## Includes

* _Target languages & regions_
* _Text pipeline (string database, tagging, versioning)_
* _Voice-over localization_
* _Lip-sync & animation adjustments_
* _Cultural sensitivity guidelines_
* _Age rating differences per region_
* _International legal considerations_
* _Regional content variants_
* _Vendor management & QA process_
